name: Ultimate Moto: Crazy City Moto
description:
Ultimate Moto Crazy City Moto is a 3D endless arcade racing game and 3d moto racing game with simple control and ecellent graphic effect.
Ultimate Moto Crazy City is a 3d moto racing game with simple control and ecellent graphic effect.

Ultimate Moto Crazy City Moto features :

- Stunning scenario with dangerous blind curves
- 3 fantastic and good cameras
- Try to get new all 2 powerups: Nitro, Magnet
- Many motorbikes you can choice

Ultimate Moto Crazy City Moto how to play :

- Tap to left button to brake
- Tap to right button to nitro speed
- Get the nitro to speed up to 300 Km / h
- Get the magnet to collect all coins on the road

Thank for play Ultimate Moto Crazy City Moto
